CustomField.formula:
IF(LEN(Apttus_QPConfig__PriceListId__c) > 0,
IF(($Profile.Name = "System Administrator" || $Permission.SWX_CCRE_Pricing_manager), HYPERLINK("/apex/Apttus_QPConfig__ProposalConfiguration?id=" &Id & "&flow=NewUIDigitalSales", IMAGE("/resource/Button_Configure_Custom", "Configure Products/Pricing"),"_self"),
IF(($Permission.SWX_CCRE_Solution_Manager || $Permission.DS_Business_Center_Admin), HYPERLINK("/apex/Apttus_QPConfig__ProposalConfiguration?id=" &Id & "&flow=NewUIDigitalSalesSM", IMAGE("/resource/Button_Configure_Custom", "Configure Products/Pricing"),"_self"),
HYPERLINK("/apex/Apttus_QPConfig__ProposalConfiguration?id=" &Id & "&flow=NewUIDigitalSalesAM", IMAGE("/resource/Button_Configure_Custom", "Configure Products/Pricing"),"_self") )) , null)
CustomField.label: Configure Products Digital
